input.sentences: we got to try a fancy dinner at a fancy place .
the first course was very interesting indeed .
the second course left you wanting more .
the third course was pretty yummy .
desert was the best of them all .
output.sentences: I promised Gail a fancy downtown dinner to celebrate her promotion.
The chef made her a special entree.
The salad was very yummy and also pretty.
I couldn't wait for dessert, which I heard was a specialty at this restaurant.
We left nothing on our plates and the desert did not dissapoint.
